ComicInfo.Summary:
Don’t miss the penultimate issue of this amazing monster-hunting adventure from Aaron Mahnke, creator of the award-winning Lore podcast and New York Times bestselling author Delilah S. Dawson (Star Wars: Phasma, Star Pig, Tales of Pell)! The hunt is on for the Barghest after it kills one of the Duke’s companions, but the hunting party is about to realize that the shapeshifting wolf monster is the least of their problems as they get closer to the mine… and the pure evil bleeding out from inside of it.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Piotr Kowalski (a) & Brad Simpson (c) | 1-2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Robert Hack | 3 |
